patthana18.29:1.1_0: Saraṇaṁ dassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.29:2.1_0: Araṇaṁ nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naaraṇo nanadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.29:3.1_0: Araṇaṁ sauttaraṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasaraṇo nasauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.29:4.1_0: Araṇaṁ anuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
